channel.title: Dell on Scott's Weblog
channel.description: Recent content in Dell on Scott's Weblog

item.title: Interop ITX, Dell Technologies World, and Spousetivities
item.description: Spousetivities will be present at two additional events this year—in fact, these events are only about 6 weeks away! Both Dell Technologies World and Interop ITX are in Las Vegas the last week of April (both starting April 30), and Spousetivities is running events for both conferences.

item.title: Technology Short Take 96
item.description: Welcome to Technology Short Take 96! Ahead, lying in wait, is a unique collection of links, articles, and thoughts about various data center technologies. Browse if you dare…OK, so I’m being a bit melodramatic. It’s still some good stuff here!
